comment.body:
Please test this rule in user filter:
`iqiyi.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-xhr-response', '"isAdShow":true,"isAdClick":true', '"isAdShow":false,"isAdClick":false', '/recommend')`

If not working, please try this rule:
`iqiyi.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-xhr-response', '/{\"order\"[\s\S]*\"isAd\"\:true[\s\S]*ad_watermark_url[a-zA-Z0-9":.\/\-_+]{10,}\}\,\{\"order/', '{"order', '/recommend')`

Different adblocking messages fixed for Android CB and iOS.

`scriptlet('trusted-set-cookie', '_ga', 'GA1.1.1908932164.2839771695')` resulted in `Adguardin çerezleri bozmasindan dolayi calismamaktadir. Adguardi kapatip cerezleri temizleyerek kullanabilirsiniz.`
Exclusion rules required for: `Reklam engelleyiciniz kapatip, tekrar deneyiniz.`


Initial adblock is shown to all non iOS/Android CB due to adblock code in ublock.js. Still checking for scriptlet rule (else adsbygoogle.js exclusion is working).
